text: “Dolomeenei, kooe go tangada dangada, haga modongoohia ina gi digau Israel bolo di madagoaa tangada humalia ma gaa hai di huaidu, ana haihai humalia ala ne hai e deemee di haga mouli ia. Maa tangada huaidu ga lawa mai gi daha mo ana haihai huaidu, mee hagalee hai mee gi di hagaduadua. Gei maa tangada humalia ga daamada gaa hai di huaidu, geia hagalee mouli.
